Transforming Public Procurement

The Bill has completed its passage through the Committee Stage in the House of Commons and will now progress to Report and Third Reading. Once it receives Royal Assent (expected later this spring) the focus will be on finalising the secondary legislation. This will include a public consultation on the draft regulations. We expect go-live will be spring 2024 at the earliest.

Get in touch

If you would like to talk to someone and don’t know who your local account manager is please contact your regional lead:

  • Alex Byrne: North (North West, Yorkshire and Humber and North East)
  • Sandra Sewell: Central (East Midlands, West Midlands and East Anglia)
  • Andrea Fitzgerald: South (South East and South West)
  • Nicola Rees: London

You can also call our customer service team on 0345 410 2222 or email our customer service team.
